00021 #include "GenericFileReader.h"
00022 #include "FileHeaderReader.h"
00023 #include "DataGroupHeaderReader.h"
00024 #include "DevelopmentException.h"
00025 #include "FileInput.h"

00027 #include <sys/types.h>
00028 
00029 using namespace affymetrix_calvin_io;
00030 using namespace affymetrix_calvin_exceptions;

00032 /*
00033  * Initialize the class.
00034  */
00035 GenericFileReader::GenericFileReader()
00036 {
00037         gendata = 0;
00038 }
00039 
00040 /*
00041  * Clean up.
00042  */
00043 GenericFileReader::~GenericFileReader()
00044 {
00045         CloseFile();
00046 }
00047 
00048 /*
00049  *  Read the file header of the generic file.
00050  */
00051 void GenericFileReader::ReadHeader(affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericData& data, ReadHeaderOption option)
00052 {
00053         OpenFile();
00054         switch(option)
00055         {
00056         case ReadNoDataGroupHeader:
00057                 ReadFileHeaderNoDataGroupHeader(data);
00058                 break;
00059         case ReadMinDataGroupHeader:
00060                 ReadFileHeaderMinDP(data);
00061                 break;
00062         case ReadAllHeaders:    // fall through
00063         default:
00064                 ReadFileHeader(data);
00065                 break;
00066         }
00067         CloseFile();
00068 }
00069 
00070 /*
00071  * Open the file stream.
00072  */
00073 void GenericFileReader::OpenFile()
00074 {
00075         fileStream.open(fileName.c_str(), std::ios::in | std::ios::binary);
00076         if (!fileStream)
00077         {
00078                 affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::FileNotFoundException e;
00079                 throw e;
00080         }
00081 }
00082 
00083 /*
00084  * Closes the file stream.
00085  */
00086 void GenericFileReader::CloseFile()
00087 {
00088         if (fileStream.is_open())
00089                 fileStream.close();
00090         gendata = 0;
00091 }
00092 
00093 /*
00094  * Read the file header and minimize amount of information read from the DataSetHeader.
00095  */
00096 void GenericFileReader::ReadFileHeaderMinDP(affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericData& data)
00097 {
00098         // Set the file name
00099         data.Header().SetFilename(fileName);
00100 
00101         FileHeaderReader fhReader(fileStream, data.Header());
00102         fhReader.Read();
00103 
00104         // TODO: Remove existing DataGroupHdrs.
00105         DataGroupHeaderReader dchReader;
00106         dchReader.ReadAllMinimumInfo(fileStream, data.Header(), fhReader.GetDataGroupCnt());
00107 }
00108 
00109 /*
00110  * Reads the file header of the generic file and reads all the DataSetHeader information.
00111  */
00112 void GenericFileReader::ReadFileHeader(affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericData& data)
00113 {
00114         // Set the file name
00115         data.Header().SetFilename(fileName);
00116 
00117         FileHeaderReader fhReader(fileStream, data.Header());
00118         fhReader.Read();
00119 
00120         DataGroupHeaderReader dchReader;
00121         dchReader.ReadAll(fileStream, data.Header(), fhReader.GetDataGroupCnt());
00122 }
00123 
00124 /*
00125  * Reads the file header of the generic file but does not read any DataGroupHeaders or DataSetHeaders.
00126  */
00127 void GenericFileReader::ReadFileHeaderNoDataGroupHeader(GenericData& data)
00128 {
00129         // Set the file name
00130         data.Header().SetFilename(fileName);
00131 
00132         FileHeaderReader fhReader(fileStream, data.Header());
00133         fhReader.Read();
00134 }
00135 
00136 /*
00137  * Open the file for reading
00138  */
00139 void GenericFileReader::Open(GenericData& data, OpenHint hint)
00140 {
00141         if (hint == All)
00142         {
00143                 OpenFile();
00144                 ReadFileHeader(data);
00145                 gendata = &data;
00146         }
00147         else
00148         {
00149                 NotImplementedException e;
00150                 throw e;
00151         }
00152 }
00153 
00154 /*
00155  * Gets the number of DataGroups in the file.
00156  */
00157 u_int32_t GenericFileReader::GetDataGroupCnt() const
00158 {
00159         if (gendata)
00160                 return gendata->DataGroupCnt();
00161         return 0;
00162 }
00163 
00164 /*
00165  * Gets DataGroupReader by index.  OpenHint should be All or sequential.
00166  */
00167 DataGroupReader GenericFileReader::GetDataGroupReader(int32_t index)
00168 {
00169         if (gendata==0 || fileStream.is_open() == false)
00170         {
00171                 DataGroupNotFoundException e;
00172                 throw e;
00173         }
00174 
00175         DataGroupHeader* dch = gendata->FindDataGroupHeader(index);
00176         if (dch == 0)
00177         {
00178                 DataGroupNotFoundException e;
00179                 throw e;
00180         }
00181 
00182         return DataGroupReader(fileStream, *dch);
00183 }
00184 
00185 /*
00186  * Gets the DataGroupReader by name.  OpenHint must be All.
00187  */
00188 DataGroupReader GenericFileReader::GetDataGroupReader(const std::wstring& name)
00189 {
00190         if (gendata==0 || fileStream.is_open() == false)
00191         {
00192                 DataGroupNotFoundException e;
00193                 throw e;
00194         }
00195 
00196         DataGroupHeader* dch = gendata->FindDataGroupHeader(name);
00197         if (dch == 0)
00198         {
00199                 DataGroupNotFoundException e;
00200                 throw e;
00201         }
00202 
00203         return DataGroupReader(fileStream, *dch);}
00204 
00205 /*
00206  * Closes the file.
00207  */
00208 void GenericFileReader::Close()
00209 {
00210         CloseFile();
00211 }
